prompt:
200 MLD treatment plant showing COMPLETE PIPING LAYOUT:
Stage 1: Intake → Coagulation (pipe with valve visible)
Stage 2: Coagulation → Flocculation (channel with gates)
Stage 3: Flocculation → Sedimentation (pipes with elbows)
Stage 4: Sedimentation → Filtration (header pipes with branches)
Stage 5: Filtration → Disinfection (underground pipes visible through cutaway)
Stage 6: Disinfection → Storage (above-ground pipeline with supports)
Show all interconnecting pipes as 3D cylindrical elements
